actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

official_title: A bill to continue in effect the current certification requirements with respect to El Salvador until the Congress enacts new legislation providing conditions for United States military assistance to El Salvador.

summary.text: Amends the International Security and Development Cooperation Act of 1981 to continue to apply the certification requirements with respect to El Salvador after the end of FY 1983 until Congress enacts new legislation providing conditions for U.S. military assistance to El Salvador.

titles.title: A bill to continue in effect the current certification requirements with respect to El Salvador until the Congress enacts new legislation providing conditions for United States military assistance to El Salvador.
